source: CESM3 (2025): atmosphere: CAM-SE; ocean: MOM6; seaIce: CICE; land: CTSM; aerosol: MAM; landIce: CISM; OASIS/CMEPS coupler
license: CMIP6 model data produced by NCAR is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC BY 4.0).
grid: 1x1 degree latitude-longitude for Amon/Lmon; native MOM6 curvilinear for Omon
institution: National Center for Atmospheric Research, Boulder, CO, USA
title: CESM CMIP7 output prepared with cmip7_prep
